title: [GAMEPLAY] Azir's ultimate does not interupt channeled abilities.
body:
Channeled abilities such as Fiddlestick's Crowstorm, Nunu's Absolute Zero, and Katarina's spin2win are not interrupted by Azri's knockback.

Steps to repro:

1. Azir ults an enemy during one of the aforementioned spells.

2. Watch how they aren't stopped and continue channeling the ability.

Video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nDqHOm4vVGs&feature=youtu.be

(not mine)

replies.body:
I had accident that might be connected to this. I ultied rammus just as he was taunting me.

The "manwall" did not knocked him up and ran through him like he was an ally.

I wanted to post video but I discovered that my lolreplay was turned off.
I might try to reproduce the bug if i find someone to try it with me.
i have also had a problem where i ulted a katarina and she was knocked up so high that she landed behind my ult. I died after that :<
